Rusty chest
Type: Container

An old rusted chest found and kept by Herbert. Just waiting to give new adventurers a helpful start.

Rusty chest is an openable treasury item. It can be found by completing various activities. They can have the odds of finding them increased with the Chest Finding equipment attribute.

Loot Tables

These are the sub-tables for the various materials, coins, and items that can come from these chests.

These treasury items take 4 independent loot rolls when they are opened.

80.000% Per Roll (99.840% Per Chest)

Activity Drops

Activity Name Skills Quantity Chance Odds Base
Rate 		W.E.A.R.‡
Cut birch trees Woodcutting lvl. 1 1 0.500% ~1 in 200 7,000 steps 4,400 steps
Forest foraging Foraging lvl. 1
Agility lvl. N/A		 1 0.500% ~1 in 200 16,000 steps 8,000 steps
Sandcastle building Carpentry lvl. 1 1 0.500% ~1 in 200 45,000 steps 30,000 steps
Sea fishing (Net) Fishing lvl. 1 1 0.500% ~1 in 200 19,000 steps 12,000 steps
Surface copper mining Mining lvl. 1 1 0.500% ~1 in 200 11,000 steps 7,400 steps
Surface salt mining Mining lvl. 1 1 0.500% ~1 in 200 11,000 steps 7,400 steps

‡W.E.A.R is a value that shows the average steps for one item at maximum work efficiency.
